response.original_title: Iu Mi Nao - Solomon Islands Regains Independence
response.overview: On 7 July 1978, the Solomon Islands regained its independence from Britain. This documentary, filmed by cinematographers John Hosking and Academy Award winner Dean Semler, looks at the people of these islands and their views on independence, and records aspects of their way of life, including their songs and dances. It also describes some of the problems facing the new nation and what is being done to combat them.
response.title: Iu Mi Nao - Solomon Islands Regains Independence
